items.description: Waterproof, moisture wicking, Vibram outsole for excellent grip and shock absorbtion
items.name: Asolo Neutron

items.description: Waterproof, moisture wicking, Rubber toe cap for durability, HANWAG IceGrip lugged rubber outsole
items.name: Hanwag Xerro

items.description: Three-section Z-Pole folding design with speed cone deployment
items.name: Black Diamond Ultra Distance Z Pole

items.description: Ultralight carbon fiber shaft is incredibly strong, Power Lock II locking mechanism provides quick and secure height adjustment
items.name: Komperdell Carbon Approach Vario

items.description: Ultralight and supportive, this pack offers the best of both worlds; its airy suspension is both light and comfortable for superlight backpacking and thru-hiking
items.name: Osprey Exos

items.description: Loaded-up with exterior stretch pockets, a side-access sleeping bag compartment and top and panel loading access, this multiday pack keeps your gear comfortably stowed and easy to access on the trail.
items.name: Kelty Catalyst

items.description: These no-itch SmartWool hiking socks maintain softness and shape through seasons of wear and washing
items.name: Smartwool Hiking Socks

items.description: Made in Vermont with legendary Darn Tough construction and performance fit to keep socks in place all day, with no slipping, bunching, blisters or hot spots
items.name: Darn Tough CoolMax Micro Crew Cushion Socks

items.description: Winner of Backpacker magazine's 2015 Editors' Choice Gold Award, this extended-trip pack has a fully customizable suspension that adapts to your body for a light and agile feel with a heavy load. Revised again!
items.name: Gregory Bartoro

items.description: Slip on this amazingly comfortable pack and enjoy the freedom of a custom, heat-moldable hipbelt and a superb, lightweight design for enhanced load support on extended backcountry adventures.
items.name: Osprey Aether

items.description: The Cool Lite Hiker Pro Crew Socks will keep your feet cool, dry and blister-free, no matter how many miles are planned for the day.
items.name: Wigwam Cool Lite

items.description: Winner of the 2014 OudoorGearLab Editors' Choice award, these women's hiking boots provide waterproof protection and excellent support at a low weight for weekend backpacking trips or long day hikes.
items.name: Lowa Renegade

items.description: With tough leather construction and waterproof/breathable Gore-Tex® protection, these women's mountaineering boots offer reliable performance for climbing and backpacking on mixed alpine terrain.
items.name: Lowa Mountain

items.description: These lightweight women's poles feature Aergon grips known for their edgeless shape and comfortable hand positioning. Plus, an internal tension cord automatically boosts durability at any length.
items.name: Leki Micro

items.description: Lightweight with a women-specific design, this versatile expanding pack lets you comfortably tackle everything from gear-heavy weekend trips to lightweight multiday treks without changing packs.
items.name: Deuter ACT
